message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started with a 50/50 split, I'm offering you a slightly lower share this time. Don't get too comfortable!
That's a pretty big drop in my share! I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to give away too much. Let's meet in the middle and make a deal!
